{"id":1522622644,"question_id":3656,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1738016013,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1522622644/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make Elements in Array Distinct","memory":"27.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOperations(vector<int>& nums) { //1 <= nums[i] <= 100\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> count(101, 0);\n        for(int i=n-1; i>=0; i--) {\n            count[nums[i]]++;\n            if(count[nums[i]]>1)\n                return ceil((i+1)*1.0/3);\n        }\n        return 0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-elements-in-array-distinct","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
